newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S JAVELIN CHAMPION HATTESTAD.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S JAVELIN CHAMPION HATTESTAD.

text.p: Profile of Trine Hattestad, who won the world women's javelin title on Saturday.
Won the 1993 world title and took silver last year in Atlanta, her first medal in four Olympic appearances.
Banned after failing a drug test in 1989, then reinstated. Successfully sued the Norwegian Federation for $50,000 in loss of earnings.
Personal best of 72.13 metres set in 1993 was the longest throw in the world for three years. Took the Norwegian title 11 times.
